titles.title: O Lord, I Am Not Worthy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O Lord, I am not worthy That Thou should'st come to me, But speak the words of comfort, My spirit healed shall be.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O Lord, Thou art all holy, The angels Thee adore; How, then, ought I sincerely My wrongs and sins deplore!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: But when Thou soon wilt enter My heart, my sinful heart, Then heal me, be my shelter, For Thou my Savior art.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O Lord, how can I thank Thee For such a gift as this? A gift which truly filleth My soul with heav'nly bliss!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I praise Thee, I extol Thee, I love Thee O my Sire, Till once in joy and glory, In heav'n I Thee admire.
